thread.title: Maritime Travel

author: Maritime Travel
title: Maritime Travel
text: Our company, Maritime Travel specializes in Destination Weddings and we have been using Greenvelope.com to assist Brides and Grooms communicate and manage their guest's RSVP's. After a quick tutorial from one of our destination wedding specialists, I was able to easily manoeuvre through the site and download amazing detail for Haley & Landon's destination wedding. I loved the template invite choices and I like the opportunity to post photos on each custom section created. Will definitely utilize this again!
